title: The Witch-king, Lord of the Nazgul (2R85)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	8
Card Type:	Minion • Nazgul
Strength:	14
Vitality:	4
Site:	3
Game Text:	Twilight. Return to Its Master may not be played. Each time The Witch-king wins a skirmish, you may exert him to wound the Ring-bearer twice.
Lore:	”'A great king and sorcerer he was of old, and now he wields a deadly fear.'”
Rarity:	R
